desc: Ancient Origins Online Store for ebooks, webinars, conferences, interviews and more.

layout.text: How did the idea of building megaliths spread? Why did people create massive stone jars in Laos? Were Greek Dragon Houses really built with mythical beasts in mind? Explore these topics and more in an anthology packed with information on some of the most mysterious megaliths around the world. Discover the stories of fascinating and enigmatic sites built in stone such as India’s Junapani Stone Circles, the carved stones of Tiya in Ethiopia, the Carrowmore cemetery in Ireland, and the Mzora Stone Circle of Morocco.
